job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pstrongResponsibilitiesstrongpp Implement and maintain the effectiveness of the data quality systempp Review Draft Protocols and provide comments on aspects of study that impact study set up data collection and transmission and workflow and implications for external client groups Sponsorvendorpp Ensure the design of clinical data collection and management systems used by the ACPRU in the conduct of clinical research trials accurately reflect the protocol requirements and needs of external client groups Sponsorvendorpp Aligns DS study team with program and studylevel analytics strategies For assigned studies works with Data and Statistical Sciences DSS Data Warehouse Analyst Statistical Programmer and Statistician to ensure the context accuracy and timeliness of clinical data collection and management systems are optimizedpp Connects with crossfunctional teams to design work product and as an analytics consultantpp Contributes to study execution lessons learned across functionspp If assigned assist in the alignment of data management systems used by the ACPRU with additional trial systems eg EDC IRT ePROpp Liaises with DSS Monitors Statistics or others involved to facilitate discrepancy management in clinical trials ppbrppstrongQualificationsstrongpp Bachelors Degreepp 2 years in Clinical Researchpp 2 years experience with Clinical research data systemspp Electronic source systems experience preferredppbrppstrongLocationstrongppOnsite role at North Chicago IL ppbrppresearch Analyticsclinicalp
